RelatedSentence: An army jawan was killed and two of his colleagues were injured when militants triggered an IED explosion targeting a patrol team along the LoC in Akhnoor area of Jammu district , a senior army official said on Monday .

A0: Indian forward posts and patrolling parties are being planned from across the border
RelatedSentence: There are also inputs that bids to engineer attacks by Pakistan 's Border Action Team ( BAT ) on Indian forward posts and patrolling parties are being planned from across the border , they said .
